title: Corki's damage now.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/mKfcahd.png
http://i.imgur.com/9WP24AM.jpg
As you can see this corki put out 6k physical damage and 34k magical, me being hybrid ezreal put out 40k magic and 30k physical.

Think corki is a great pick now if you have a full ad team he has magic damage that can crit.
